content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0), furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0), furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0), furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0), furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) and respective chests

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Transport system
Consists of transport belts and small electric poles at various positions

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure burner mining drills have fuel before starting the mining process
### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure furnaces have ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure boilers have fuel before starting the steam generation process
### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure steam engines have input liquid and fluid present in connections before starting the electricity generation process
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure offshore pumps have a working fluid system before starting the water pumping process
### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure pipe groups have a working fluid system before starting the fluid transportation process
### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure electricity groups have a working voltage before starting the electricity distribution process
